title: 5.0 Acres Tea Estate For Sale
location: Pitadeniya road, jayanthi junction, Off Udugama road, Galle
details:
Plain and medium size hill land. Nearby the village road and 3 km to jayanthi junction at udugama road. A leaves shed and small house.
Monthly tea leaves 1200kg.
New crop and first trimmed
Direct access
Clear deeds
7 km to the Pinnaduwa highway entrance
